name: Escape Velocity (fredriclam)
description:
Created by Sacha Perry-Fagant and Fredric Lam

A simple physics simulation game featuring gravity, special relativity and a cute photonic main character. Play with space bar, arrow keys, and B. Unity Launcher.

Relativity is a crazy phenomenon that we can't see everyday--it makes things get shorter the faster they go. Gotta go fast!

Submitted at McGame Jam 2017 (Team 29: the team whose name was so long it was abbreviated but then our descriptions are in revenge long).

Royalty-free assets used:
